alert.note: Alert for Overton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 3:05AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Overton County through 345 AM CDT... At 305 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Livingston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Livingston and Rickman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Brief heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to minor localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
